result.title: Weekly training #1: Data strucures
result.content:
Hi Everyone,

As promised today we start the weekly training. This round emphasises mainly on data structures. Here is a link for the problems.

Big thanks to PrinceOfPersia, RedNextYears, flashion, and everyone who helped setting this round ( sorry if I missed someone here :) )

Note: I compiled 16 problems right now, I know it is very difficult to finish them in one week, especially the hard ones. The goal is to group interesting problems on specific topics, that way you may finish them later when you have more time -- we can also extend the one week to 2 weeks if everyone is ok with it. I will also add more problems to the list later.

Note 2: If you think you know some other interesting problems, please let me know.

Note 3: We can discuss problems here in the comments: if someone needs a hint or has a doubt about some problem.

Note 4: link to the scoreboard by RedNextYears -- You need to register, but totally worth it.

HAPPY SOLVING !
